channel.title: Server Auto Restart - 30 mins?
channel.description: Hi im elite owner of evo.servegame.com port 5555 and when im at school or doing something else i just need a auto restarter to keep my server up i have tryed auto restart were you put ur port in which doesnt work and ive tryed elecsion autoserver or something along the lines of that but i would really like it if someone has a working program or even teach me how to make a schdule task thanks very much[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 07:03:31 PM[/size][hr]help please[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 07:18:28 PM[/size][hr]SOMEONE HAS TO KNOW OF SOME RESTARTER[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 08:26:07 AM[/size][hr]hello

item.title: Server Auto Restart - 30 mins?
item.dc:creator: @eliteftw eliteftw
item.description:
@eliteftw wrote:

Hi im elite owner of evo.servegame.com port 5555
and when im at school or doing something else i just need a auto restarter to keep my server up
i have tryed auto restart were you put ur port in which doesnt work
and ive tryed elecsion autoserver or something along the lines of that but i would really like it if someone has a working program or even teach me how to make a schdule task
thanks very much[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 07:03:31 PM[/size][hr]help please[br][size=1]Posted on: May 07, 2007, 07:18:28 PM[/size][hr]SOMEONE HAS TO KNOW OF SOME RESTARTER[br][size=1]Posted on: May 08, 2007, 08:26:07 AM[/size][hr]hello
